mapper.insert: INSERT INTO gfi.e_user_feed_request (nickname, email, status, created) VALUES (#{nickname}, #{email}, #{status}, #{created})
mapper.select: SELECT id, created, nickname, email FROM gfi.e_user_feed_request WHERE status = #{status} ORDER BY created ASC LIMIT 1
mapper.update: UPDATE gfi.e_user_feed_request SET status = 'waiting-for-process' WHERE status = 'processing'
